storyList.title: first
storyList.text: I created this world, but now i am trap in it.

storyList.title: kids
storyList.text: They were born into the suburbs, they were bored so they moved into the cites. But then the air was missing, so they ran into the woods and they were never seen again.

storyList.title: world
storyList.text: Technology gives me control. Technology gives me sounds. Technology gives me challenge. Technology gives me independance. Technology gives me kids. Technology gives me a phone call. Technology took me. Technology speak to me. Technology tell me.

storyList.title: Letgo
storyList.text: Let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go, let go.

storyList.title: craziness
storyList.text: Craziness is a door that opens to new worlds. To go deep you need, somehow, to self-destruct, to lose control. If you control everything you always go to the same place and you stop seeing new things. Follow your core and excitement. Follow what seems crazy, and when you'll get there, you will look around you, you'll see that everyone is crazy but you

storyList.title: joke
storyList.text: My boss said to me once,out loud, XXEEFX should become a rock star, as a joke.And in that sentence, i felt truth inside of him.He said it like a joke, but you could feel that it wasn’t , totally wasn’t.And i saw through him for an instant. In his joke i felt how he was tire of being here.I saw myself in him. But i saw my 20 years older self. That is what i saw.
